npc_output: I'm just waiting for someone, it's so foggy today, |r1|.
It's going great, thanks for asking! The sunny weather is perfect for it.
Always, but it's getting dark, let's be careful, |r2|.
Actually, I have a great one for a warm breakfast, perfect for a snowy morning.
Yes, I could use some assistance with the ceremony, it's about to start, |r1|.
I'd love to, but it's stormy outside and my instrument is not suitable for this weather, |r3|.
It's been tough, but I'm managing, waiting for someone to talk to, |r1|.
Yes, I can play something for you, but I need to practice first, |r5|.
Actually, I have a package to deliver, care to join me, |r1|?
It's urgent, I need to deliver it before sunset, want to help, |r4|?
I'm always up for learning, what did you have in mind, |r1|?
I'm tracking a skilled one, care to join me, |r1|?
I'm always experimenting, want to see what I'm working on, |r1|?
No, I'm good, just need to focus, thanks for offering.
I'd love to, it's one of my favorite subjects, |r1|.
